### Problem 2
```{r}
sim_mean_sd = function(n = 30, mu, sigma = 5) {
  sim_data = tibble(
    x = rnorm(n, mean = mu, sd = sigma)
  )
  sim_data |> 
    t.test() |> 
    broom::tidy() |> 
    summarize(
      mu_hat = estimate, 
      p_value = p.value
    )
}
```
